channel.title: Runescape Private Server & Webhosting Solutions
channel.description:
Well, primarily, my webhosting website, serves shared hosting plans, reseller plans, gameservers, shoutcast, teamspeak, and dedicated servers.
My website URL is: [url=http://xtendhosting.co.uk/]http://xtendhosting.co.uk/[/url]
I have had great interest for far and its going really well, i actually host our good friend here Pwnd, so you can ask him if its ant good :)
the webhosting server is in a red hat linux, i686 evironment.. (centos 5 x64 to be presise)
the gameservers run on windows server 2003, all our servers are UK based with direct, 100mbps, tier1 connections.
Amongst other things, people have been asking me about hosting their runescape private servers on my gameservers. I have decided that this could be a good idea, and am currently offering this service at £6 monthly... it includes FTP access to your dir, unlimited bandwidth, and a web based control panel to start / stop your server (still in development)
if you are interested, feel free to contact me via msn: (drewley@hotmail.co.uk)
thanks all!
